title: I have a challenge for you metalheads: I want you to find something more adrenaline-pumping than...
body:
...This chorus:
http://youtu.be/M3_5Klf9dtc?t=42s


This will help me find new bands for action-combat PvP :) I'm very open-minded when it comes to music. I listen from rap to dubstep, metal to classical, pop to country.
